WEATHER FORECAST FOR SEA AREAS AROUND THE ISLAND DURING NEXT 24 HOURS
Issued at 12.00 noon on 25 December 2024.
Condition of Rain:
Mainly fair weather will prevail sea areas around the island.
Winds:
Winds will be north-westerly or variable in the sea areas around the island and speed will be (20-
30) kmph. Wind speed can increase up to 40 kmph at times in the sea areas off the coast extending
from Galle to Hambanthota via Matara.
State of Sea:
The sea areas off the coast extending from Galle to Hambanthota via Matara may be fairly rough
at times.
Rainfall amount (mm): Light: 00-12.5, Light to moderate: 12.5-25, Moderate: 25-50, Fairly heavy rain: 50 -100,
Heavy rain: 100 – 150, Very heavy rain: 150 or more.
